item.title: Notes: Jiang. (2013). Mining the Temporal Evolution of the Android Bug Reporting Community via Sliding Windows
item.description: References Citekey: @Jiang2013 Jiang, F., Wang, J., Hindle, A., & Nascimento, M. A. (2013). Mining the Temporal Evolution of the Android Bug Reporting Community via Sliding Windows. CoRR, abs/1310.7. Retrieved from http://arxiv.org/abs/1310.7469 Notes This paper reports a study of applying an interesting sliding-windows social network analysis on Android bug reporting community. This technique shows clear advantage in comparison with global analysis of social networks in that it takes temporal information into consideration.
